msbt.message: I don't mean to brag, but isn't this room absolutely fabulous?I've spent no small amount of time arranging everything to suit my refined sensibilities. Go on, feel free to appreciate it as much as you like. I won't mind, !

I'm VERY particular about my bed. <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Clearly I sleep extremely well on my here. I mean,<20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" /> just look at me! They don't call it beauty rest for nothing, .

Have you been keeping up with the latest shows, ? There are so many these days!Personally, I like romantic dramas, thrillers, reality shows I suppose I'll watch any genre, really.<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Sometimes I curl up in front of my here and binge whatever suits my fancy. <20_2 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You might say it's a guilty pleasurethat I don't feel all that guilty about.
Sometimes when I'm at home alone listening to music, I suddenly find myself dancing around the room. My goodness, I know how foolish it sounds! Still, I just love it when the rhythm takes me away!

I do realize that island life moves at a more relaxing pace. Still, it behooves us all to be on time! One mustn't make an appointment and then run late to it just because one lives on an island. It's uncouth! That's why I so prominently <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />display my here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> I am nothing if not couth, darling!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />The is a wonderful plant, isn't it? It's just so vibrant and alive, . They say it's good for plants if you talk to them. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But this oneI swear sometimes I think it's talking to ME.

There's nothing more rejuvenating than enjoying a nice hot bath, . <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />After a hard day, I love sinking into my here. It melts my stress right away. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />There IS one problem It's hard to make myself get out! I confess, I've turned into a prune more than once.

I always sit down <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />at my to do my skin-care regimen. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Lining up my various products and performing each careful step is meditative for me. Just as you water a flower to maintain its beauty, so you must moisturize your skin, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This is simply amazing. It's comfortable to sit in AND good for spinal alignment. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You should try sitting in it sometime. I promise it'll do wonders for your posture, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />My when I look at it, it brings back so many memories I should probably get rid of it, but I can't bear the thought of not seeing it around <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Terribly silly, I know.
My dear, have you seen my yet? It's both stylish AND functional. Noooo, it's most certainly not just for show! I really do use it. Ahemnow and then.

So, you're surprised to see in MY home, are you? It's true. I enjoy perspiring almost as much as I enjoy wearing sneakers with a ball gown. Still, I do work out on occasion as part of my beauty regimen. Fitness is the key to fabulousness, I say!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I know it's unexpected to find inside a home, but it's quite stylish, no? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It matches the room's decor surprisingly well, so I've grown quite fond of it, .
